opening.title: major
opening.question_text: Of the following categories, which best describes your area of study?
opening.options_text: A. Not a student/Undecided; B. Humanities; C. Social Sciences; D. Engineering/Hard Sciences; E. Other
opening.options_prompt: Please enter a letter from A to E and then press Enter.

opening.title: frequency
opening.question_text: How often do you typically engage in any sort of creative writing? This includes fiction, essays, journalism, poetry, etc.
opening.options_text: A. Never; B. A few times a year; C. A few times a month; D. Several times a week
opening.options_prompt: Please enter a letter from A to D and then press Enter.

variable.title: preference
variable.question_text: If given the choice between seeing the sentences from Group A or the sentences from Group B, which would you prefer?
variable.options_text: A. Group A; B. Group B
variable.options_prompt: Please enter either A or B and then press Enter.

variable.title: variety
variable.question_text: Of Group A and Group B, which provides a better variety of related sentences?
variable.options_text: A. Group A; B. Group B
variable.options_prompt: Please enter either A or B and then press Enter.

closing.title: adoption
closing.question_text: Now that you've seen the tool in action, how likely would you be to use it if you had to do some creative writing?
closing.options_text: A. Not at all likely; B. Not very likely; C. Neutral; D. Somewhat likely; E. Very likely
closing.options_prompt: Please enter a letter from A to E and then press Enter.

closing.title: level
closing.question_text: In general, how well did the suggested sentences match intended difficulty level?
closing.options_text: A. Not at all well; B. Not very well; C. Somewhat well; D. Very well; E. Extremely well
closing.options_prompt: Please enter a letter from A to E and then press Enter.
